Title: Relates to the advance payment of tax credits under the STAR program
Summary: Provides that if a taxpayer has not received the advance payment of credit under the STAR program prior to the end of the taxable year then such taxpayer shall have thirty days to file an application for a STAR exemption.
LawCode: Amd ยง425, RPT L; amd ยง606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to the school tax relief (STAR) credit
